0110010001111101 1110001101101000 1 -> sum: 0100011111100110, cout: 1
0100101000000101 0111110001100101 1 -> sum: 1100011001101011, cout: 0
0101101100000000 0110110110101110 1 -> sum: 1100100010101111, cout: 0
0100100010101010 1101110111001100 0 -> sum: 0010011001110110, cout: 1
1010110110011001 0010011101001000 0 -> sum: 1101010011100001, cout: 0
0100010010011000 0000111011110110 0 -> sum: 0101001110001110, cout: 0
